Controls

Left Click = Fire 

W = Go forward

A = Go left

S = Go back

D = Go right

Space = Dash

Game

İn our game;

  • Cyan
  • Purple
  • Green
  • Red

There are 4 different types of enemies.These enemies are coming at you to kill you and your goal is to collect as many points as possible by killing them.The higher the number of waves, the higher the probability of stronger enemies coming.At the end of each wave, you are given 3 upgrades that you can choose completely randomly. Each upgrade has a different chance of conflict.

feature list is given below;

  • Health Upgrade
  • Bullet Damage
  • Movement Speed
  • Bullet Speed
  • Reload Speed
Screenshots This game was made by 7 Studio in 1 day
